author: Flame442
install_msg: Thanks for installing deepfry. Use `[p]deepfry` or `[p]nuke`.
name: Deepfry
description: Apply filters to an image to deepfry or nuke it. Supports frying images automatically as they are sent, the most recent image, a linked image, an attached image, and profile pictures. Run [p]deepfry and [p]nuke to fry!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
